scripts.cert: rm -rf local-dev/https-cert; mkdir -p local-dev/https-cert; mkcert -install; cd local-dev/https-cert; mkcert jwst.dev;
scripts.hosts: (grep "jwst.dev" /private/etc/hosts &> /dev/null && echo "Your /private/etc/hosts file already has an entry for jwst.dev.") || (echo "127.0.0.1    jwst.dev" >> /private/etc/hosts && echo "Updated your /private/etc/hosts file to include jwst.dev")
